heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and follow our journey on social media. We are here to answer your questions and accompany you on your path to healing.
footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of two sacred plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, indigenous cultures have used it as a spiritual tool for healing, introspection, and connection with the divine.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces a modified state of consciousness that allows for deep emotional and psychological exploration. It acts as a mirror to the soul, revealing unresolved patterns, traumas, and blockages, while opening the heart to profound states of love, compassion, and universal connection.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, guides, and heals. It is not a recreational substance but a powerful spiritual medicine that demands respect, intention, and proper guidance. Each ceremony is a unique and personal dialogue with this ancient wisdom.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to deep questions, discover their life's purpose, and gain a clearer perspective on their path.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of emotional blockages, the healing of past traumas, and liberation from limiting patterns such as depression, anxiety, and addictions.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It fosters a deep connection with oneself, with others, and with the universe, generating a sense of unity and belonging.
groupCeremonyDescription: Group ceremonies create a shared energy field that enhances the healing experience. Sharing the journey with others fosters a sense of community and mutual support, where each participant's process contributes to the collective healing.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies. This format allows for a deeper focus on individual intentions and a therapeutic process tailored to your specific needs, guided directly by our spiritual masters.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our guides are the heart of 'El Arte de Sanar'. With years of experience and a deep respect for ancestral traditions, they create a safe and loving space for your transformation.
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins before the ceremony. We guide you in physical and mental preparation to open your heart and mind.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where, guided by icaros and masters, you connect with the medicine to heal and learn.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep journey of introspection. You may experience visions, emotional releases, and profound revelations.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you understand and apply the teachings received to your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet purifies your body and enhances your connection with the medicine. We recommend starting at least one week before.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention is the compass of your journey. A clear and open mind is essential.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and cultivate a state of presence.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. What questions do you bring to the medicine?
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes. It's a powerful tool for self-discovery.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca works deeply on an emotional level. It is common to confront suppressed emotions such as sadness, anger, or fear. Allowing these emotions to surface is part of the healing process. Our guides will be there to support you with love and compassion, creating a safe space for you to navigate your inner world and release what no longer serves you.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and profound experience.
preparationCtaDescription: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Our preparation guide is designed to accompany you in this sacred process.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to continue your journey.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You have successfully logged in.
googleSuccessDescription: Welcome! You are now logged in.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Welcome!
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Update the information for this guide.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete the guide. This cannot be undone.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% deposit.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, book ceremonies, and receive guidance on your spiritual path.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome, I am your Spiritual Guide. How can I help you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
userManagementSubtitle: View, manage, and communicate with all registered users.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users in the system.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailSubjectPlaceholder: A message from El Arte de Sanar
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! I'm inviting you to fill out the questionnaire for El Arte de Sanar to better understand your needs for the ceremony. You can fill it out here: [LINK]
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review of the user's submitted answers.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted the questionnaire yet.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be reviewed by our team to ensure a safe and beneficial experience for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: Please provide details about your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication, especially for depression or anxiety (e.g., SSRIs)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. We will review your answers shortly.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'yes'.
dialogSuccessDescription: Your information has been received. The next step is to prepare your mind and body. Visit our preparation guide to get started.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for submitting your information. You can review your answers below or proceed to the preparation guide.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
tourWelcomeTitle: Welcome to El Arte de Sanar, {{name}}!
tourWelcomeDescription: Let's take a quick tour to show you around. First, please provide your phone number so we can contact you about the ceremonies.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will use this to send you important information.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see videos and memories from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: This section shows our upcoming ceremonies. Click to see details and book your spot.
tourStepFinal: That's it! We invite you now to fill out our confidential questionnaire. This is a crucial step to ensure your safety and prepare you for the experience.
editHeroVideoDescription: Upload a new video or provide a URL to update the main hero section.
selectNewVideo: Or select a new video to upload
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. This action can be reversed.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the past events list.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from the main lists but it will remain in the system.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our history of events, from upcoming gatherings to cherished past memories.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its origins, and its transformative power.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey.
